articles.title: Deaths due to coronavirus in Quebec surpass 7,000 | CTV News - CTV News Montreal
articles.description: Quebec reported Saturday that 139,643 people have now tested positive for COVID-19 in the province and 7,021 people have died since the start of the pandemic.
articles.content:
MONTREAL -- 
Quebec had a double dose of bad news in its battle against the COVID-19 pandemic Saturday.

articles.title: UK testing error wrongly tells 1,300 people they have coronavirus - Reuters
articles.description: Over 1,300 people in Britain were inaccurately informed they were infected with coronavirus after a laboratory error at the government's NHS Test and Trace system, the Department of Health and Social Care told Reuters on Saturday.
